name: MyWife
0:
”Alexa, ask my wife if I can buy a new truck”
”Alexa, ask my wife if I can go hunting”
”Alexa, ask my wife if I can have more bacon”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my wife
des: Use this skill to get the answers you always wanted from your wife. Just ask and it's approved! You can ask "My Wife" for permission to buy things, go place, or do activities. Have you always been told "no" by your wife? Now you can finally hear "yes" as relayed by Alexa. Watch her stunned to hear Alexa approving things on her behalf! She won't be able to argue because Alexa doesn't lie!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
